message.raw:
A fix to ensure that exceptions do not pass silently

functions delegated to the main thread with inmain_later now will raise exceptions
in the main thread if wait() has not been called on their events
(ie if no thread is listening on the result, and therefore no thread will otherwise raise the exception).
